pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, August 22, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, August 22, 2016:

Sudbury, Ontario

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Retreat.

Laurentian University
935 Ramsey Lake Road
Sudbury, Ontario

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Bell Park
Near the Amphitheatre
Paris Street
Sudbury, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Open media coverage

5:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a community BBQ.

Science North
100 Ramsey Lake Road
Sudbury, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 5:15 p.m.

PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
